intro: Miscanthus condensatus f. purpurascens, commonly known as the purple fountain grass, is a striking ornamental grass native to China. It features narrow, grass-like leaves that transition from deep green to a vibrant purple hue as the plant matures. The plant produces fluffy, silver-white plumes that add visual interest during the late summer and autumn seasons. It thrives in full sun to partial shade and prefers well-drained soil. This cultivar is valued for its architectural form and seasonal color changes in garden landscapes.
